const getDayNames=()=>{const weekday=["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"];// Get today's date
const today=new Date();const todayIndex=today.getDay();const todayString="Today ("+weekday[todayIndex]+")";// Get tomorrow's date
const tomorrow=new Date();tomorrow.setDate(today.getDate()+1);const tomorrowIndex=tomorrow.getDay();const tomorrowString=weekday[tomorrowIndex];// Get the day after tomorrow's date
const dayAfterTomorrow=new Date();dayAfterTomorrow.setDate(today.getDate()+2);const dayAfterTomorrowIndex=dayAfterTomorrow.getDay();const dayAfterTomorrowString=weekday[dayAfterTomorrowIndex];return{today:todayString,tomorrow:tomorrowString,dayAfterTomorrow:dayAfterTomorrowString};};export default getDayNames;
